document.masterDocTitle: A review of the Cetoniinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Argentina and adjacent countries: systematics and geographic distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the Cetoniinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Argentina and adjacent countries: systematics and geographic distributions

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Paragymnetis flavomarginata subsp. carbo Schühff.
:
Schürhoff 1937: 67
(list; distribution);
Blackwelder 1944: 263
(catalog; distribution).

Gymnetis flavomarginata ssp. carbo Schürhoff, 1937
:
Krajčík 1998: 77
(catalog; distribution).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution:
BRAZIL
( Schürhoff 1937 , Blackwelder 1944 , Krajčík 1998 ).
BOLIVIA
( Schürhoff 1937 ).
ARGENTINA
( Schürhoff 1937 ); Type localities not stated: 1 male holotype , 1 female allotype , several paratypes , Col. Schürhoff ( Schürhoff 1937 ), [NHMB] ( Antoine 2001 ); paratypes , Mus. Berlin ( Schürhoff 1937 ), [MNHU] ( Antoine 2001 ).

/ rubricata /
var. nigra
